news.title: Bladee, Dawn Richard, and More: This Week’s Pitchfork Selects Playlist

news.title: 21 Savage Announces New Album What Happened to the Streets?
news.summary: The rapper’s follow-up to American Dream is set for release this Friday, December 21

news.title: Pitchfork Launches New Dijon Zine
news.summary: The Los Angeles singer-songwriter is our Artist of the Year

news.summary: The Talking Heads maestro will be on the road until next July

news.title: Bob Dylan Announces 2026 U.S. Tour
news.summary: Yet another extension of the Rough and Rowdy Ways tour kicks off next spring

news.title: Golden Globes 2026: Nick Cave, Jonny Greenwood, Max Richter Nominated
news.summary: All three pick up original music nominations as One Battle After Another, Sentimental Value, and Sinners lead the overall pack

news.title: Bright Eyes Announce Anniversary Concerts for I’m Wide Awake, It’s Morning and Digital Ash in a Digital Urn
news.summary: Built to Spill, the Moldy Peaches, and Tilly and the Wall are set to open the 21st anniversary shows
